title: Demand for water cannot be an 'afterthought' in AI push
description: Australia has more than 250 data centres and more in the pipeline, prompting experts to warn against using drinking water to cool servers.

title: Florida lawmakers ready for data centers amid growth of AI and other technology
description: With growth of artificial intelligence and other technology, preparations are underway in Florida for what could be an influx of data centers that would use massive amounts of electricity.

title: Advanced AI ‘robots’ at Iranian Tech Expo were actually humans in disguise
description: Humanoid ‘robots’ on display at an Iranian tech expo were revealed to be actors wearing elaborate costumes.

title: Feds: Owner of Houston-area company was sending advanced US AI technology to China, Hong Kong
description: Feds said the company and its owner were conspiring to send Nvidia H100 and H200 high-performance GPUs to China and Hong Kong.
